website_summaries.verdict: These are a great value, especially for kids; you just can't beat the price while still getting quality sound.
pros: Comfortable over the ears, these headphones will also stay in place and are lightweight
cons: There's a little static when the cord is moved and no deep bass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, poor plastic.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very good sound quality. But the top of the head band broke so soon. I used it very well. I even have the original packing box which I use to carry it around. I continue to use it with tape around the top! It is a shame it broke, because I absolutely love the sound quality and how nicely this fits my ears. Edit: The seller has promptly sent me another headphones. Thanks for that. I hope that this one lasts. I am updating my rating to the five stars for the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashutosh Dhekne

customer_reviews.title: Broken fast but excellent customer service to replace them -
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one month, only one ear has sound. Edit: After writing the above as a two-star review, I was contacted by their customer service. They really care about user feedback, and spontaneously offered to replace the faulty unit, or give a refund. It was very nice on their part. I'm changing this review to four and half stars, it would be five if the unit had been working without fault, because while it was working it was a really good pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Herve Bronnimann

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, sound, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She hasn't used them for more than a few months and the sound only comes out of one ear. She likes the look and feel when they were working, but they just aren't as durable as I'd like for them to be. I'll be looking fore new ones. EDIT: updating from 2 to 4 stars. As you can see below the manufacturer contacted me about my review. Proactively, they offered a replacement/refund and I appreciate that they stand behind their product. Due to the fact that the sound is good, the style is good and the company stands behind it, I feel confident giving it a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. FOXX

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones at this price point that I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these last week, and honestly, I'm impressed. I have had numerous pairs of headphones over the years. Most, I use around the house, or while out walking. I prefer an over the ear type, because the ear buds have never worked well for me. But, I want a lightweight pair, with great sound. And up until now, I wasn't able to find a pair for under $20 that could deliver. And these are delivering. The sound quality is really really good for a pair of headphones that cost less than most of my music. They adjust easily, fit well over my ears, and stay in place during walking and light aerobics. For the price, I'm truly happy
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Already Shorted Out in One Ear
customer_reviews.text: I bought 7 of these for use in my classroom. They are stored neatly and are being used by 6th graders. In less than a month, two have already stopped working out of one ear. Not very durable. UPDATE: The seller has been harassing me to remove this negative review.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great - doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: We used these for less than 3 months (purchased end of August, broken end of November). The sound is great, they are portable, nice to wear - my daughter loves them. BUT - they simply didn't last. I don't think she was too hard on them - what suddenly stopped working was that the integrated volume control 'lost' about 70% of it's volume. The slider still works, but the LOUDEST setting on the slider is like a murmur/whisper - it can barely be heard. I'd really like to give these a higher rating, but we were disappointed they didn't last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luhman

customer_reviews.title: On the fence - we'll see about pair #2
customer_reviews.text: Very infrequent use over 4 months and one of the speakers in the headphone now works only intermittently. They've either been on my head or on my office desk, so it isn't as if they're subjected to any abuse at all - these things just don't work. Incredibly frustrating that they stopped working only after the window for returns has closed. EDIT: Jelly Comb reached out to me to remedy the situation. After discussing with them, I am awaiting a replacement set of headphones. Hopefully the set I originally received was simply a dud and this second set will prove to be longer lasting. Will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: BWH

customer_reviews.title: Disposable headphones after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used it for less than 5 months (Dec 1 to March 25) and it stopped working. Fortunately, Amazon issued a $10 courtesy credit and I contacted the manufacturer to see what they'll do and based on that, I’m updating my review. It took about a month or so but I heard back and they sent me a new pair and I’m happy they did that. I honestly did not think I’d hear back because the message I sent through Amazon said it wasn’t delivered. But they made it good. So despite that particular headphone having poor quality issues, it all worked out in the end. Thank you for taking care of it.
customer_reviews.author: NJD & DMD

customer_reviews.title: The plug stops its connection
customer_reviews.text: It seemed all right for a few weeks, but then it started skipping as the plug didn't fit tightly. I've tried it with different devices (iPod, android phone. and HDaudio Playaway), and my husband tried to tighten it which temporarily helped. I think the problem is bc of the flexible spring connected to the plug. This feature should be an advantage, but seems to become a disadvantage after a short time. UPDATE --got immediate response and choice of replace or refund. Really appreciate this company!
customer_reviews.author: Good Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: These have powerful sound, just what I needed. I use them for my Fire tablets and just use the volume dial on the device. I haven't needed to use the volume on the headphones. Before I got these, sometimes I could hardly hear my tablets with ear buds or just listening to the device itself. Depending on what I was listening to it would be too hard to hear. With these head phones I don't need to turn the volume up more than half way. Amazing sound.
customer_reviews.author: summerblonde

customer_reviews.title: These didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic materials made these last less than 6 months. Fortunately, they were cheap, so you get what you paid for. The headband broke not too long into owning them, but nothing duct tape couldn't fix. I did like the cord's length, and the color was OK (I'm one of those weird people who doesn't mind white). But the materials were just so cheap, and the fact that they broke so quickly - when they literally didn't leave my desk at work - just shows how bad they're made. I ended up pitching them, in the end. They were just junky. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Headphones at Unbeatable Price
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing not to like about these low cost headphones that I got as a replacement for a Skull Candy pair that basically began falling apart. Available colors, knot resistant cord (works wonderfully), very comfortable on-ear pads and covering (almost identical to my Bose), lightweight, and comfortable. Audio wise, they are great. I have now listened for over 6 hrs from Rock to Jazz, Country to Classics, and they have not disappointed with ZERO distortion even at high volumes. One small thing that I really like on the cord is a 'slider volume' control (see photo) for instant level control. I handily recommend these headphones for their nice quality and audio.
customer_reviews.author: Brewmeister

customer_reviews.title: but this thing is FREAKING AWESOME! It has a skip/rewind button code
customer_reviews.text: Okay, honestly, this isn't the type of product I normally get excited about, but this thing is FREAKING AWESOME! It has a skip/rewind button code, which is something that has always bothered me about most other headphones. And the volume control is independent from my phone! Which I didn't even know was a thing I wanted until I realized these did it. So I can lower it using the headphone and then even further using my phone and vice versa. Plus they're pretty good at blocking out ambient sound and they get pretty loud. And they're comfy. Okay, I'm done nerding out now.
customer_reviews.author: Chilbon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Since headsets tend to disappear amongst my coworkers, I was looking for a headphones, not buds, that would do the job for a throwaway price. Good sound quality, not tinny or obnoxious humming. They are not sound cancelling, but nowhere do they claim they are. Comfortable to wear for extended time without getting that sweaty ear feel. Easy to adjust but the plastic is lightweight so I would not pull too hard. I have never used the built in microphone since I am generally using them for classical music to mute the constant chatter in the cubicle jungle. A good investment and since they are large and easy to spot, no one has yet walked away with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Loved these, but plastic broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. First I will say, these are very comfortable headphones. I get headaches often and these are the only headphones I’ve found so far that do not put much pressure on my head or ears. The sound quality is great. I really loved these...until they broke. The plastic piece that goes across the top of the head broke in two places after only two months of non-strenuous use. I’m so dissapinted as these have been my favorite headphones. I wish the plastic was thicker/stronger. I had no issues with the sound or controls, but they are not wearable now.
customer_reviews.author: Cara T

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible not sturdy mine broke on the 4th use. Waste of money and time. **Update** the company saw this review reached out to me to replace my headphones or refund. I went with refund because I had already gone with another company for another pair of headphones. Also, to be honedt wasn't sure if the same thing would happen again. But I do appreciate the suggestion of refund. Will update again once i actually get the refund. So for now I moved my reviee from a 1 to a 2 even thou the company ask gor a 4 to 5 star review change by me.
customer_reviews.author: nitada01@gmail. com

customer_reviews.title: Lasted four months.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months. Bought as a Christmas gift. Stopped working in April. I was hoping only the earbuds did that. I guess not. Addendum: Seller reached out to me and asked if i preferred a refund or replacement. I said replacement is ok if this malfunction was a fluke. I will test out the replacement but if that unit similarly fails, I will update my review again. My five star rating is for good support from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: EagleRock Dude

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, well priced, well delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly heavier than i thought they would weigh and they fit a little too snugly, they do reproduce sounds quite well. I've used them to listen to hi-def opera and the voices came through quite clearly and distinguishable ef a little chopped at the base notes. All together, for the price, i'm quite satisfied. This company is fantastically responsive. They are trying, and are successful, in making my purchase be fully satisfactory. It is rare that i have found any business work so diligently to achieve customer satisfaction and i applaud them for doing just that!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability
customer_reviews.text: When they worked, the sound was great. Soft ear pieces. However, they lasted less than 2 months, and they can't be returned after so many days. Edit: I was contacted by the seller regarding this review and they offered to either refund or send a new pair. Thinking maybe I had just gotten a bad set, I opted for a new pair. They lasted less than 2 weeks. When listening to a show/movie you could sometimes hear background noise or the music but not the talking. Very disappointed and will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable product
customer_reviews.text: My kids run through headphones like they’re going out of style. They break so easily. I’m lucky if they last a couple months. This pair lasted my daughter five months before they started glitching. I consider that awesome. Getting a new pair for her today and another for my other daughter (ages 8 & 10). Thank you! UPDATE: After the above review, and three weeks after purchase, my daughter complained that the headphones we causing Siri to start up during normal use (watching Netflix or playing Fortnight). She has stopped using them. Kind of a disappointment after the first set were so awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: From vacation to the classroom..
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as a cheaper pair of headphones and love them! I used them numerous times on my flight to England and back and they worked perfectly. The sound is very crips and clear and the white color is so clean and refreshing. The ear piece is very comfortable to wear and the grips on the top headband part make it stay easily on your head. They are also adjustable and worked wonderfully! After using them on vacation I transitioned them and put them into my classroom and my students loved them! Great for adults and kids since they are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: MandieS.

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is pretty good for doing basic things
customer_reviews.text: This is my first impression review of this product. I just received this product today and have used it so far for listening to music and playing video games on the computer. The sound quality is pretty good for doing basic things. I have not used it to make/receive phone calls as of yet however I will primarily be using these to listen to music, online class recordings, and to play computer games. The headphones are very lightweight and even a little flimsy. Overall, it works exactly as expected,
customer_reviews.author: Tasia T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these comfortable headphones. I find earbuds to be annoying and uncomfortable, so I was pleased to fine these on ear headphones for such a great price. The are adjustable, so that the fit comfortably on me and on my 4 year old, who uses them to listen to audiobooks. And the sound quality is excellent. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C.

customer_reviews.title: Solution to ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I love these as they fit over my hearing aids and I don't have to take them off when I want to hear music or watch a movie without bothering others. I use these on my large head and they fit very comfortably. Ear buds are too big for my ears and always fell out or hurt so I am very happy I now have these to just slip them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Girl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The rubber part was falling out from before I started using it. Material is very cheap and the part that folds broke within 2 weeks of use. Waste of money... If I was stil in the US i would've returned this product. Not worth it. You're better off buying literally anything else. Update: I still believe the product wasn't the best, however the customer service was impeccable and the company reached out to me immediately and apologized and even refunded my money with no hassle. I'm grateful for that however I still believe the product is low quality. Product: 1 star Customer Service: 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sharifa M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: [Edited: The seller refunded the purchase, so I have added an extra star for good customer service. I wish at least one of the pairs of headphones were still working, but I do appreciate a seller who stands by the product.] These headphones are adorable, but after 5 months of light use (my daughter uses them in the car), they no longer work. My son has a pair in a different color and those are broken, too.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor headphones, decent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: After seeing my negative review, their customer service reached out to me to ask if I wanted a replacement or refund. I chose refund. The upgrade to four stars is specifically for customer service, not for the product itself. Original Review:They worked great and felt great to wear... until they stopped working. First the right ear went out, then finally neither side worked. I think there was a short in the cord, but we didn't travel with them and they stayed on the same desk the whole time we used them, so they didn't get a lot of wear and tear. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: momof3va

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price; Head piece snapped after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Good sound quality and range -Pause button and sound adjuster work well -Ear cushioning is comfortable-fits around ears well (mine are small) -Durable cord and plug -Foldable aspect makes it easy to carry around -Lightweight Cons: -Half of the head piece snapped at the top after 5 months of use (still wearable) -If you wear glasses and/or have cartilage piercings these headphones become uncomfortable after 2+ hours of use (maybe it's like that with all headphones for us glasses-wearing folk) -Long cord can get tangled, coiled or in the way easily--requires frequent readjusting
customer_reviews.author: Francis G.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for kids but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these, in different colors, but one of them only worked for 2 months before either the stereo or mono speaker went out. It plays the music of the movie just fine but you can't hear any of the talking anymore. The other 2 work well, but I am disappointed that it didn't last long, and only weeks after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a backpacking trip through Europe. Having said this, I always kept it separate from the rest of my stuff and never squished it. There are two "straps" that go across the top. One broke after about 3 weeks but I was still able to use it. I will say, usually after about 2 hours my ears would start to get sore so I would have to stop using the headphones. After about 2 months the other top strap broke so there was no tension anymore so I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service was great
customer_reviews.text: *update* I was contacted by the company after my one star review and they promptly sent a new pair of headphones out to replace our broken ones. *Old Review* Already broken. My kids have not done anything bug use them for their iPads....DO NOT BUY! I have now missed the cut off for returning them by a couple of days. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: H. Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Quality inexpensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: Something about my ear canals that prevent earbuds from fitting comfortably, so I'm quite pleased with this headset; it fits comfortably and has good frequency response. Seems to be well-built with quality materials. For this amazingly low price I would definitely recommend this item to others. (Why can't we match this level of quality at such a low price domestically instead of going to China for it?)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last for 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. Now, we’ve had them for 2 months and they stopped working. Makes songs randomly skip and pause all the time. UPDATE: after posting this review, the seller contacted me and they’re sending a replacement for free! Hopeful that the new one will work better and longer. I’ll try to remember to update this review once we’ve had them for a while. But very pleased with the customer service from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: emschwar

customer_reviews.title: these are pretty good headphones
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are pretty good headphones. I like the mic and volume control. However, they definitely hurt my ears and head after more than 40-60 minutes of use. I have to take breaks while flying, for instance - I can't listen to something through an entire flight. I also sometimes have difficulty getting the sound to come through - when I plug them into my computer's audio jack I have to wiggle it around a bit to get the sound. But, hey: the price is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Time
customer_reviews.text: I had to follow-up on this review. Within hours of submitting my review below, their Customer Service reached out to me to rectify the issue and I'm pleased with their speedy response!!!! So, had these for all of three days and the spring has already separated and it’s sliding up and down the cord. Kind of annoying but otherwise decent headphones. Hope they last but I’m wary.....
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort and look of these headphones and definitely like the price, but unfortunately the quality is severely lacking. I've purchased either 4 or 5 of these over the last few months and they simply don't hold up. Another pair just went out this week, and I won't be bothering with ordering these again. Now to find a quality pair of headphones that will hold up for more than a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: everyday.bluemoon

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre headphones with great mic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these expecting at least some level of noise cancellation. I was disappointed. The sound quality is decent for the price, the microphone is great (better than my $160 Bluetooth headphones' mic), there is a volume slider/play-pause control (which works with Siri) and the headphones overall are indeed portable. However, the round part that contains the speakers does NOT rotate and the cushions are somewhat stiff, meaning that there is mediocre noise cancellation at best. I am honestly relieved I had a coupon to subsidize half my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Dead after less than 2 months of VERY light use
customer_reviews.text: We bought these earphones so that our daughter could plug them in while practicing on her electronic piano. This is the only use they got: one hour per day. The sound was sufficient, the earphones appeared sturdy. And then, they simply stopped working. No obvious damage, no obvious wire break. They had been kept on a shelf by the piano. And granted, they were inexpensive, but $12 for less than 2 months use...no. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: *Update, lasted one school year before left ear went out. Still worked good and for the price worth it. Perfect fit both for my daughter and my wallet. Good sound these will be used for school. We wont use the mic feature. Really like how small the fold up into. I mean these are not beats but are great for people who are money conscious. I mean do you really need $300 headphones? $10 ones will do the same damage to your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Punker McCrackin'

customer_reviews.title: Not built well after 3 pairs they dont hold up
customer_reviews.text: Maybe 3 months I have owned 3 pairs of these because they just don’t hold up. The mic is usually the first to go and then the left speaker. These are. It abused in any way but are used a few hours each week and the durability and build quality of the connections just don’t hold up. Too bad because they look good sound good and fairly comfortable but don’t expect them to last more than a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Aa-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! I got these for my kids for when we had to travel. They work wonderfully! Only caution is if you have your device turned up to full volume these are extremely loud! They hurt my ears. Otherwise they are great and have a volume adjustment on the headphone cord and a mute button,
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Good choice buying these
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of headphones. I'm not one that can use ear buds so over the ear phones are my choice. These are low cost but made well, sound just as good as my Beats pair. I'm not a fan of Beats because they are heavy and tight, after a short while they cause headaches. These jelly combs don't do that. Good noise cancelling and good sound with volume control on the wire. Using when mowing or walking, they do great. If you needs a low cost pair of headphones, these are ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap headphones act like cheap headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones over two months ago, and had I reviewed them immediately I'd have given them a five star rating. They do actually sound great. But within a couple weeks I noticed that they were hurting my ears because the ear part was too small. Then after a month or so, the top part broke and I used tape to put them back together. Now the side part broke. I'll include photos to show what I'm talking about. To be fair, though, they really do have good sound quality for the price, which is why I'm giving it a 3-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but broke within 7 days
customer_reviews.text: On a quest to find durable headphones for my tween. Although he was enthusiastic about the fit and comfort of this pair, one ear pad fell off after a week of use. So disappointing. Will not repurchase or recommend. ETA: The company emailed me and offered a refund or replacement. I didn't want the hassle of sending the defective pair back, so I opted for a refund. They also asked me to amend or delete my review. I bumped it up from 2 to 4 stars based solely on the fast refund. I will look elsewhere to replace the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: A Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He really liked them a lot until last week
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my eleven year old almost four months ago. He really liked them a lot until last week. Unfortunately now he has to hold the cord just right to hear anything. He probably uses the headphones for less than 20 hours a week and always plugged into a laptop while sitting. Edit: I am very impressed with the customer service. They immediately contacted me and offered a full refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Team Tortoise

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly the smartest buy I have had in awhile!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite a spender and definitely like to have things but the thought of buying 200 dollar beats or airpods just wasn't something I could afford. I bought these a little bit worried whether these would actually work or just break in the first couple days. I am very happy to say that these headphones are still in top condition. They are a little bit wide on the head but you get used to them. The sound quality is great as well. Unfortunately, I have found that they don't have very good noise cancelation and the cord is a bit long for my taste. Overall though, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Also they are already going bad. We have to keep moving or twisting the ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using these on my 7 year old's Galaxy Tab 3. I can't believe how loud these are. They are not safe for any child that might turn them up all the way. They are loud enough to actually hurt my ears. Also they are already going bad. We have to keep moving or twisting the volume control part of the cord when it starts cutting out. They haven't been abused or used anywhere other than the house.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for school, they lasted less than a month before the wires frayed just below the ear piece. Disappointed they didn't last long. The students keep them in a bin by themselves so it was just normal wear that they became frayed and no longer work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but....
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** I had originally posted a 2 star rating. I was contacted by the seller and was given a replacement pair! Awesome customer service. The headphones work great!! We bought these headphones for our daughter for our trip to FL from PA. Halfway through the trip they stopped working. I figured she didn't have them plugged in correctly but after fiddling around with them it turns out they aren't working right. When they did work they worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Fun stickler

customer_reviews.title: Short life span- UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: My tween loved the sleek design & color. Sadly it stopped working the first month. Wound up trashing it after watching it sit unused for another month. My dollar earbuds lasted longer. Would not recommend due to poor workmanship and lack of durability. Looking nice is not enough. The product must work.. UPDATE- after reading my review, the seller apologized & offered to replace or refund the headphones. Since I had already replaced, I chose the refund & received it promptly. For very good customer service, I give Jelly Comb 4 stars. The give the product 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for almost a year now and when they recently developed an issue, customer service was top notch in resolving it! As far as the headphones themselves, I am very pleased with the value for the money. If you are looking for primo sound and durability, I would tell you to order an expensive pair instead but if you are an average listener, these headphones are great for the price point. I would definitely purchase from them again! Customer service rates 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda304

customer_reviews.title: My kids are tough on headphones - and I would ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids are tough on headphones - and I would say these are more for kids than adults. We have probably gone thru at least 5 pairs until the Jelly Comb's. I did have a pair break, but that was because my child got the cord stuck in the door while dragging the cord behind her and it broke at the volume connection on the wire. I don't think that had anything to do w/ how they were made, it was how tough my kids are on gear!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They adjust to my head size/length, they don't cause too much pressure on my ears with the circular cushions, the sound quality is great, they block out a little more noise than my Yur Bud earbuds and I love the colors! If I need to I'll definitely buy these again :)
customer_reviews.author: PurpleCow81

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month. Unfortunately, that's when the return window ended. What a coincidence. My daughter paid for these from her allowance money and now is left with nothing. Shes very upset. She bought them to use for school and the headphones didn't even make it to the first day of school.
customer_reviews.author: Baba1212

customer_reviews.title: They don't last!
customer_reviews.text: **Update - The company reached out to me and have sent me another pair of headphones. I've upgraded my review from a 1 star to a 4 star. But if they break again as quickly as the last pair, my review will be edited again. ** I purchased 2 sets of these headphones. We've had them just a little bit over a month. One pair is broken, wiring is loose and the connection is no longer working properly. Can't return them since I'm just outside of the return window. Won't be buying these again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lythica Blyss

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality At A Good Price
customer_reviews.text: My sister ordered these for her portable stereo, which is gold color. These were reasonable, and she is most impressed with the sound quality. After reading mixed reviews on these, I suggested to her not to fold them up to as breaking seemed to be the biggest issue. Time will tell, but we priced ear buds in local stores that cost twice as much. These are also very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I bought these for my students to use w ipads, *I could only afford 8 so they are getting a lot of use* first graders are very hard on everything & they are being used constantly. Fingers crossed they last until June! So far so good! There was a small issue upon receipt and customer service sent a new pair the same day I contacted them! It was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The headset broke about 1 month after purchase. I used duct tape to hold it together because the speakers were still working. Then about a month later the speaker on one side stopped working. Into the trash bin in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Maitai

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with excellent quality! Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my niece. She's 13. I was not expecting it to be this good. I only paid $12.99! The sound quality is superb! The feel of the material is expensive. It folds conveniently when you store it. The jack is cleverly built with a spring. The wire material is one of a kind. I love the sliding volume control, very convenient! It's very stylish. My niece loves it! I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Nell Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: like turning on podcasts or music when Im trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do what they please, like turning on podcasts or music when Im trying to call people. Drives me crazy, if I plug it into my iPhone the headphones manage the experience not me awful. I didnt follow up after this but apparently they refunded me
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality the headphones is quite good and the company stands by their product
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality the headphones is quite good and the company stands by their product. Very refreshing to see that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hlozek

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good on-ear headphones for $11. I've used for various tasks such as gaming,music, audiobooks. I can assure you for all tasks the sound quality was superb! However, with this much money you have to cut costs in some ways. This headphone isn't great for long sessions of gaming, the padding around the drivers digs into my ears like an excavator. The mic isn't bad but if you play games which require mics then you should invest on a headset. HOpe this information helps!
customer_reviews.author: Itz_Wahee

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, for a short while
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. Kids headphones can tend to be cheap and fall apart or break easily. Had higher hopes for these. But after only about a month, his headphones have lost the higher range sounds. So essentially unusable now. On the bright side, I guess, I have another pair, in turquoise, for my daughter, and those are still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oburg

customer_reviews.title: I loved these ear phones and used them mostly with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these ear phones and used them mostly with my ROKU, but they drain the batteries very quickly on the ROKU remote, or it's a weakness with the remote and note the headphones. I dropped them the other day and the thing broke. No sturdy at all. Sound is good, perfect for watching movies, and lsiten to music. I repaired them with tape.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Jelly Comb contacted me to repIace my broken headphones right away. I should receive them in a few day. I ordered 2 of these and was pleasantly surprised that there was a plastic piece that was rather comforting when wearing the headphones. However, one pair started cracking right in the middle. Then they broke. I have had the headphones for less than 3 months. However, the seller replaced them right away!
customer_reviews.author: Napptural Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted... only 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for ny daughter for use in school. Used them 3.5 months and then the part that plugs into the device snapped off into the device. Thankfully her teacher was able to get it out but not before i got a tearful call from my daughter panicking that her headphones were broke and she feared her school issued ipad was also wrecked. I do not recommend these headphones. After talking to the seller, they have sent a replacement pair. 5 stars for the customer service but the jury is still out as to the quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: trewee

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in January of this year. The two plastic bands on the top that go over your head, have already broken off. Don't even use them every day and I handle them very carefully and take good care of them. I am really disappointed in these. Guess I'll spend a more for something better. Would not recommend for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Vallee

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son used these a few times while playing Xbox games. They worked great at first. But less than two months later, the sound quit working. First on one side, then both quit.
customer_reviews.author: Maxi

customer_reviews.title: I Expected Better
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED - the manufacturer provided a full refund on my purchase, and I have upgraded the evaluation from 2 to 4 stars. While the product itself didn't make it a month (of admittedly heavy use) before one of the channels went out, the post review customer service was above and beyond. They were comfortable while they worked. Expected better from the product, delighted by the response when the product didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Barton

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered three pairs to use for homeschooling, all three broke within the first 45 days. While the company quickly sent out replacements under the warranty, the replacements have also started not working correctly. I can’t recomend these for anyone looking for a daily use product. The sound is decent for the price and the company’s customer service is great but the product itself isn’t long-lived at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good value headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very light, decent quality. I wish they would fold up smaller as I purchased them for travel. I wear hearing aids, so can't use in-ear headphones on an airplane. These are an inexpensive compromise to sound-insulating headphones; They do NOT filter out all noise though I was able to watch and hear a movie during a flight.
customer_reviews.author: Tapir

customer_reviews.title: Good but didn't hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones about 6 months ago. I love the way they look, the sound quality is great, and they're way better than the headphones I had before. Unfortunately the plastic band has broken in a few places that i taped back together, but now the band that connects the wires snapped and I dont get sound in my right ear. I liked these but I definitely wish they had lasted me more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good sound qualify
customer_reviews.text: This my second pair of headphones. The first one stop working after two months. I decided to give it another try by ordering another one because of the sound quality. So far, I have not had any issues with the second one, besides, it's only been three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good pair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my son for his birthday and he likes them. He is only 9 but they still fit him pretty well. They were easy to use right out of the box and work well with hus tablet. Not the best headphones we have bought but are a good set for my son because he is not ready for wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Company treats customers well
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for my son to listen to his iPad. They lasted about a month before one of the ears lost sound. I bought the same pair again, and don't you know the same thing happened again about another month later. I posted my poor review on Amazon, then I was contacted by the seller. They said that they would give me a full refund for my purchases. It is good to hear that someone still stands by their product and will do what they can to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: tom mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones but with a slightly tinny sound, rather than a deep bass sound that most might desire out of on-ear headphones. That being said, this is a surprisingly great product and well-worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: Êlle2Lindã

customer_reviews.title: 9yo daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves these and uses them often. I haven’t tested out the headphones myself but these aren’t her first pair and with the other brands she complained about the issues she had with them. She hasn’t reported any problems with these and therefore I’m giving it 4 stars. I think they’re pretty durable too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baird

customer_reviews.title: I don't what other users are doing to their poor headphones, but I've had these for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't what other users are doing to their poor headphones, but I've had these for a while and they're still fully intact. They sound good. They work. I'm happy. Update 01/22/2019: They still work, but after lots of abuse, cord being rolled over, dropped, etc., the side without the wire only works occasionally. They're still good for a cheap headset if you're kinder to them than I have been.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and easy to travel with , poor plastic headband
customer_reviews.text: These are great sound quality headphones and really do cancel out background noises in loud rooms to enjoy you’re music so they still deserve good ratings , fun colors in addition . Unfortunately I recently turned my head and the top headband broke in the center where it’s sold plastic , tried tape but still wouldn’t stay on ears properly , lasted 6 months bummed but don’t want to chance it again . Be very careful if you buy them for that reason .
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Earpad problem fixed!
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones on Feb 11th, 2018 and it's been barely a month and already one of the earpads have come off! I contacted Jelly Comb via their support email and found out that the black ring is removable and the earpad can be put back much to my relief! I had to use a butter knife to pry the black ring off but it turned out to be a simple fix. I really like these earphones because they are economical and lightweight and is perfect for me other than the issue with the earpads. I am glad that Jelly Comb was able to help me fix it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Sound is find; unit is not very durable though.
customer_reviews.text: Well the headphones themselves work- that's never been an issue. However, just the return period (of course!) of owning them, one of the top over-the-head pieces cracked and we've had to keep it taped. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: A homeschool mama

customer_reviews.title: super cheap plastic. Breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a few weeks and I only use them at work so they mostly sit on my desk. I'm not packing them in bags or even taking them anywhere yet somehow theyve broken in THREE places so far!! I've been taping them with electrical tape because otherwise the plastic pokes into my head while I'm wearing them. Wish I would have bought different headphones!!! I wanted these to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material breaks very easily.
customer_reviews.text: This terrible product broke while on my head in the middle of the head piece. As I put tape to hold it together in the return box, it broke into two more pieces. This is a terrible product and I would never recommend this to any other person. Update: Updating to 5 stars for customer service and overall 4 stars for the product. The overall sound and noise cancelling is ok but the material is very thin on head band and breaks very easily. Overall a good buy if you are on a budget
customer_reviews.author: Shankar

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely can't complain. They're cute, they're comfortable, they're reasonably priced, and the sound quality isn't half bad. Edit: The headband snapped into pieces in June. Went to put them on, and they cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Manatee

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but works great.
customer_reviews.text: Spent a ton on Turtle Beach headsets for my son just to have them stop working after just a few months. This works great on his Xbox One and the price was right. He wears these literally every day. Unfortunately after about a month one of the earpieces stopped working due to a problem with the inline mic. Upon hearing of our problem with the headphones, Jelly Comb handled the issue quickly and professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kraushaar

customer_reviews.title: Very good for their value
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and so is the fit. I DID snap the top band but that was after 3 months and due to my own carelessness. If you are careful with these(don't leave on ground, don't toss or stack heavy things on them), then they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality for a great price! I was so impressed with the durable ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality for a great price! I was so impressed with the durable cord, especially at the end where it is metal tipped with a spring coil that prevents fraying (my biggest pet peeve with the traditional apple earphones). The design is sleek and comfortable, and the sound quality is also very strong. It's a good travel size and adjusts to my head. I am very happy that I decided to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst headphones I have ever had. My first pair and the warranty replacement both stop working after about 3 weeks. The sound stops working in one headphone first then the other goes very soon behind it. I will never buy anything from this brand again. I recommend getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Broke one week after return deadline. I have owned these headphones for 37 days. I iked how loud and clear they were but they definitly should have lasted a lot longer. Update: Customer service was very helpful in solving my problem. They sent me a new pair at no cost. I really appreciate this. I hope these new ones last longer than the last.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Rose

customer_reviews.title: Material
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, it looks pretty good. I used it for 12 days and the top is already braking. The material is very cheap. The volume control is okay and the sound is good. You get what you pay for, but I would have hoped that the material wasn't that cheap to break within 12 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart fast
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were awesome for my daughter until the padding fell off an ear (after probably 3 times being worn). Now we cannot get it to stay no matter what so I’m having to buy new ones again so she will have some for our upcoming trip. I wish they would have held up better, because they’re adorable and she really loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Volume has some problems.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are good and the microphone works. At low volume I lose sound in one ear. And the "lowest" volume at which I get sound can still feel too loud most of the time. Update: Customer Service from Jelly Comb was kind enough to respond to my remarks and offer a replacement or refund. I think it's a generous offer considering this is a budget friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: cyanilynn

customer_reviews.title: Ok item. Thin top ouece cracks too easily
customer_reviews.text: Ok item. Works great. Great features. Like that you can pause and control volume on cord. BUT, the top piece is too thin and has already cracked in 2 places and I've had to duct tape (my 12 year old uses these)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Filograsso

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, brittle, and crackle sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had better headphones for cheaper. It crackles and pops. I can tell it will easily fall apart. I will definitely have to buy a new pair soon. I wouldn’t recommend these headphones. ETA: They were kind enough to give me a refund. 4 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: The Paulson’s

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm loving it the only reason it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving it the only reason it's not 5 stars it's a bit to small for my ears and it pinches the tips in just the wrong place if i use them for to long
customer_reviews.author: Elliott R

customer_reviews.title: Speakers don’t last but still a good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is good. But the one speaker blew out within a month and had to junk then. But I am pleased to let everyone know that this company does follow through with comments and has fixed my problem with the headphones. These are very good headphones and my daughter did love them.
customer_reviews.author: teri

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone, but durability a question..
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, but broke. Seems to be most of everyone's issue; cracks and snaps at the top. Originally ordered 2 in November for both kids. One broke, and I reordered another pair in March but now that one broke too.. 2 pairs messed up out of 3 ordered.. great headphone, just durability is not up to par, I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Buenrostro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for elementary age children that need them for computer labs or their tablets. It stays in place and controls the volume not to exceed a safe level. Really good value and they look nice. They stopped working inexplicably a couple months until the school year but there are no torn, loose, or exposed wires
customer_reviews.author: Sadie P

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the pair I recently bought for long. I will say that these headphones are very comfortable, have an excellent sound quality for a low price headphone. Packaging was easy to open, arrived in great condition and securely shipped. Would recommend if you cannot afford high price headphones.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a second time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 year old, and i ended up getting a second pair for my 8 year old. They are cute, comfortable, and very fitting for kids. They do not break easily and have a durable plug in port. It is reinforced and i would even buy this a 3rd time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: On Ear Headphones with Mic, Jelly Comb Foldable Corded Headphones Wired Headsets with Microphone, Volume Control for Cell Phone, Tablet, PC, Laptop, MP3/4, Video Game (Green & Purple)
product_meta.description:
Color:Turquoise

The on-ear headphones with mic, designed with stretchable headband and soft leather earmuffs, fit perfectly and securely on your head, which you can wear all day without any discomfort. Unique in-line control design makes it easy to adjust the volume, enjoy music and chat with your friends. Stereo bass sound provides you the superior audio experience.


Features:
✔ Fashionable stylish sleek and trendy design.
✔ Rich and dynamic sound with stereo bass.
✔ Lightweight and foldable design for convenient storage and carrying. Flexible headband for easier sizing.
✔ Minimize outside noise due to soft cushioned, pressure-relieving ear padding.
✔ 46 inches tangle-free cord with multi-function in-line control, adjust the volume at your fingertips, easily control your music with one button: pause, play, next song, previous song.
✔ Built-in microphone makes hands-free talk at ease anytime.
✔ Support all devices with a 3.5mm jack: Cellphones, tablets, PC, laptops, MP3/4, etc.


Specifications:
Frequency Response: 20-20KHz
Impedance: 32ohm±15%
Sensitivity: 103dB±15%
Cable Length: 46 inch
Microphone: Built-in 
Jack: 3.5mm


Package Included:
1 x Headphones
feature_bullets: ✔ PREMIUM COMFORT ON-EAR HEADPHONES: Comfortable on-ear lightweight design along with soft ear cushions and adjustable padded headband provide premium comfort even during long listening sessions.
✔ FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE HEADPHONES: Foldable design for portability makes the corded headphones easy to put into your package and take along anywhere.

✔ MULTI-FUNCTION IN-LINE CONTROL: The corded headphones features an in-line microphone for hands-free phone calls with one button control and one volume control. Adjust the volume to a comfortable level, easily control your music: Play, Pause, Previous, Next.
✔ STEREO BASS: Excellent rich & dynamic sound quality with bass response, delivering competitive acoustic performance with a unique look and feel.
✔ UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Equipped with 46" tangle-free cable, compatible with almost all 3.5mm jack audio devices: iPhone, iPad, iPod, Android cell phones, tablets, PC, laptops, Mac and more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,420 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
